mapper.sql: SID, TID, SRID, AID, SNAME, PIC, MP3, IS_HOT, IS_NEW, PTIMES, AUDIT_STATUS, SHOW_STATUS
mapper.insert:
insert into song
SID,
TID,
SRID,
AID,
SNAME,
PIC,
MP3,
IS_HOT,
IS_NEW,
PTIMES,
AUDIT_STATUS,
SHOW_STATUS,
LRC,
#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{srid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isNew,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ptimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{showStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lrc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update song
TID = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SRID = #{srid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AID = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SNAME = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIC = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MP3 = #{mp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_NEW = #{isNew,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PTIMES = #{ptimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHOW_STATUS = #{showStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LRC = #{lrc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update song set TID = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SRID = #{srid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AID = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SNAME = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MP3 = #{mp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_NEW = #{isNew,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PTIMES = #{ptimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHOW_STATUS = #{showStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LRC = #{lrc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update song set TID = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SRID = #{srid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AID = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SNAME = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MP3 = #{mp3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_NEW = #{isNew,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PTIMES = #{ptimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AUDIT_STATUS = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHOW_STATUS = #{showStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from song s LEFT JOIN mtype m ON s.TID = m.TID LEFT JOIN songer sr ON s.SRID = sr.SRID LEFT JOIN album a ON s.AID = a.AID where s.sid = #{sid}
